thread.title: FIR lodged against 'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar
thread.title_full: FIR lodged against 'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: FIR lodged against 'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar
text:
FIR lodged against 'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar 
FIR has reportedly been filed against 'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar.
According to a report in BollywoodLife , Noida police has filed a case against Manveer Gurjar under the section 341 of the IPC.
According to the report, a felicitation programme was organised by Manveer Gurjar's family and friends at a park in sector 46, Noida.
A permission for 40 vehicles to be there at the venue was taken from the police. However, over 1000 vehicles ended up at the venue creating a ruckus. It caused a huge traffic jam outside the venue. Following the commotion, FIR was lodged against Manveer Gurjar. The punishment under section 341 ranges from one month of imprisonment or Rs 500 fine, or both.
Meanwhile, a video of his 'secret marriage' went viral with reports claiming that he also has a five-year-old daughter. The video shows Manveer Gurjar in wedding finery, riding a horse with a bunch of kids and youths following him.
Also read:  'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar: My only aim was to mend my broken relationships 

A grab from the 'wedding' video 
While the identity of the bride is not known, it is said she may be from his hometown in Haryana or Noida, where he currently resides.
Also read:  'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar: My father wants me to pursue career in Bollywood 
During his Bigg Boss stint, Manveer claimed to have run away from his house since his family wanted to get him married early. However, he never mentioned a wife or child. In fact, he was linked to co-contestant Nitibha Kaul, but maintained they were "just friends", but he wasn't sure what the future holds in store.
Photos: Manu Punjabi-Monalisa, other famous link-ups in 'Bigg Boss' 
 
Manveer's parents claim the video is doctored.
Also read:  'Bigg Boss 10' winner Manveer Gurjar's parents claim his 'wedding' video is fake
